author: sky.cactus
content: I have disabled the greeting bot until it gets fixed (by GitHub).

author: abdel.stark
content:
I don't know if it can help or not but i started a tool to help kickstart EIPs. It is an interactive command line tool that prompts questions to the user and create the markdown file for the EIP according to the official template. The user can select among a list of choices for some fields like the status (less error prone than an open field IMO). Some fields are stored in a global configuration file such as the author name and github handle so that they are the default answer and the user can skip writing them. I will try to extend it to add more features like maybe automating some git operations to help authors with limited knowledge of git. Any feedback welcome.
https://github.com/abdelhamidbakhta/generator-eip

author: sky.cactus
content: <@!187490121698770945> I think we need an EIP repository administrator to fix the greeting issue.  We need to make CI not rely on it, since it is broken (due to bug introduced in GitHub).
